page.title: 06CHILDREN'S PLAYGROUND GAMES
page.content: {ELASTICS}is played by girls. You need 3 metres of elastic tied in a loop. Two girls standing inside the loop stretch it. The rest take turns to jump in, out, and around the loop.They have a sequence of jumps. When a mistake is made the next girl takes her turn. { {KINGY}is mostly played by boys. To start everyone crouches in a circle, with legs apart. Someone then drops a ball in the circle. Everyone then tries to hit it through someone's legs, if it goes in, they're on. The person who is on throws the ball at everybody. He is allowed to run but when he hits someone they help the person to catch the rest, but from then on they cannot run with the ball.
